extendedInfo.description: Piramal Healthcare presents i-sure app !i-sure app is a convenient tool to track your periods especially your ovulation dates or fertility period. We strongly believe that âConfusion se behtar hai sure hona!âTo begin, you need to enter your period start day and cycle length and bingo you are on. You can see your calendar indicating the fertile days as well as the next predicted periods. It also shows your fertile days in a month where your chances of getting pregnant are the highest. It also helps you to record information like when you have had sex last time or when you took the ovulation test etc.With a tap of your fingertip you will be able to update âPeriod start dateâ every month.     i-sure app is loaded with various features. Use i-sure app to find out your Fertile days:1. On the home screen, click on the âClick to continueâ tab2. Then select your period start date and cycle length (for cycle length, calculate first day of your period as Day 1) and submit3. You will get a calendar of that particular month with red bands indicating your âPeriod datesâ and green band indicating your âFertile daysâ4. Light pink band at the bottom tells you when you need to start testing with i-sureOnce you are regularly using it, you can also update the period start date every month:1. You need to enter your period start date and cycle length only for the first time. The second time onwards, whenever you get your periods; on the home screen tap on â Update your period start dateâ and it automatically calculates your cycle length2. Light pink band at the bottom tells you when you start testing with i-sureIn case of any questions related to the usage of i-sure1. Go to home screen, click on the âHelpâ tab at the bottom2. You will see the set of FAQs3. Just click on a particular question, to get an answerKindly email us your comments and suggestions to consumercare@piramal.com. You can also call us at 1800-229-898 (India users).

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Easy to use and track ovulation days. Gives period dates as well so no headache of counting days ahead to know when the next period date is. I will give it 4/5.
reviews.author: kaksha choudhari

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: This app has helped me track my periods and ovulation dates. It is very easy to use and gave me accurate results. No need to keep adding on data and information. Just feed it once with your dates and it keeps updating itself.
reviews.author: Nilofer Memon

reviews.title: i sure app is good
reviews.comment: i sure app is very good and pretty helpful in indicating the ovulation dates. For  people who are trying for a baby badly,this app can be very benificial for them. Also the sms facility is good to remind you when you are close to ovulating. (y)
reviews.author: Priti Tavsalkar

reviews.title: horrible
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t even run right on my Android. It is not easy to use. If I could give 0 stars I would\'ve
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Confusing
reviews.comment: Tis is a kind of ok app bt problem is wen dates of periods change u can\'t change d length of cycle wch is impt. Plz fix it...
reviews.author: sindhu naik

reviews.title: good app for using isure
reviews.comment: this app is good for women who are using i-sure. it makes it very easy to decide on when to start testing with isure.  the good thing is it provides me an option to get reminders regarding my ovulation days and days when i have to begin testing - with an SMS.  helps me because i am sure i would have otherwise forgotten those days.  In any case, i think it is a good app especially if you are using i-sure... and remembering your period dates is quite a pain... with this, i dont have to worry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your time
reviews.comment: The tracker only asks for my start date and then only process my cycle as four days long. I wish. It practically had me ovulating two days after I actually ended. You can\'t add in other variables either
reviews.author: A Google User
